billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Provides that retired persons shall not be employed as the superintendent of schools of a school district for more than one year
summary: Provides that retired persons shall not be employed as the superintendent of schools of a school district for more than one year; provides for a waiver of such provision if such school district demonstrates undue hardship.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the employment of retired persons as superintendents of schools
